com.teamonehundred.pixelboat

Class Obstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.MovableObject
      • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.Obstacle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ObstacleBranch, ObstacleDuck, ObstacleLaneWall

    public abstract class Obstacle
extends MovableObject
implements CollisionObject
    Represents the obstacle as an abstract class that extends from movable object and implements the CollisionObject interface.

      • getBounds

        public CollisionBounds getBounds()
        Returns a new collision bounds object for the GameObject.

        Creates a new collision bounds object representing the current position of this GameObject. See the collision bounds visualisation folder in assets for a visual representation.

        Returns:
        CollisionBounds object of GameObject
